name: personal-portfolio
description: A showcase of personal projects. Built using React-Redux and the WordPress REST API.

commits.message:
Merge pull request #6 from VitaC123/active-development

Add Sentry error reporting

Add production only condition for Raven

No need to send error reporting during development.

Merge pull request #5 from VitaC123/active-development

Fix failure to load response from WordPress app - CORS

Add new path to new WP app

Fresh WP install as a new Heroku app.
